lender.name: Nyanya Aisha
lender.loan_because:
I believe in "Wreckless Generousity"... I've seen it's gifts manifest in my life... & I simply must find meaningful ways to impact the lives of my brothas & sistahs around the world!
AMANDLA!!!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to offer chances so honest, ambitious and hard working people can grow and succeed in the same way that so many have helped offer me opportunities over the years.
lender.occupational_info: I provide information about products so sellers can find the right buyers for their products and buyers can spend their money wisely.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: People help me and I help others in return. The book "The Rudolph Factor".
lender.occupational_info: Mentoring people that have a strong desire to grow their business and make better business decisions. Co-author of the book, The Rudolph Factor.

lender.name: Gerrit
lender.loan_because: it's fair, and more sustainable than donating

lender.name: Mhe - Amor
lender.loan_because: I want to help my mom put up a piggery
lender.occupational_info: it is not sufficient to help my whole family that's why I want to make a loan for my mom to help us support our daily needs.

lender.name: JohnW
lender.loan_because: I want to help transform a war-torn and fractious Middle East with aid to entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: Manage business finances

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: I believe in the teachings of Share International that the world will be uplifted through sharing. Share-International.org
lender.occupational_info: I work in hospitality and in Healing. I do Shamballa Energy Healing and Meditation for the uplifting of all of mankind.

lender.name: Nina & Gustav
lender.loan_because: We asked to receive money to give away for charity as wedding gift instead of stupid things...

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to give me the same chance.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I loan therefore I am
lender.occupational_info: I teach science and game design in a high school

lender.name: kelly
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy :)

lender.name: Carolyn and Frank
lender.loan_because: We encourage and support entrepreneurs around the world to create a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: Professionals (retired)

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world. I think that in a small way, I can put aside a certain amount of my income to help those that are less fortunate without calling it a handout.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe empowering women will make the world a better place

lender.name: Dr. Kamba
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who help themselves

lender.name: Michael & Maria
lender.loan_because: "if your brother becomes poor and cannot maintain himself, you shall maintain him. You shall not lend him your money at interest, not give him your food for profit." Leviticus 25:35

lender.name: Carolyn and Craig
lender.loan_because: I have been to Africa recently (Rwanda and Kenya) with some wonderful non-profits - Project Jambo, and Women for Women International...and I've seen the miracles small loans/help can give.
lender.occupational_info: I direct a Division in County government that provides animal care services, vehicle licensing, marriage licensing, and document management services to the public.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe in the innate goodness of people and that individuals drive economies. Change happens little by little, then all of a sudden.
lender.occupational_info: I train people how to use computers, work well with others and market products

lender.name: Macey & Liam
lender.loan_because:
I give because it feels good to give to people who need it. -MACEY
It makes me feel good when I loan. I hope he gets profit so that he can get what his family needs.
lender.occupational_info:
I go to school, do gymnastics, swimming, soccer, and piano and I play with my brother. -MACEY
I go to school, play chess, play with my friends, do art, and learn.

lender.name: Laure
lender.loan_because: I support micro-loans as a way to empower people.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: many need a leg up...If not us, who? If not now, when?

lender.name: Tomas
lender.loan_because: I like to help my countrymen
lender.occupational_info: Supporting Entrepreneurs

lender.name: July
lender.loan_because: my mission is to inspire and empower the world to live in hope and victory in order that we may create a global community based on collaboration, contribution and co-operation. Can you imagine it? I do every day. I believe that one day, together, we can do it.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: It fits in with my view of the way the world should work and how I should function in it.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the care of patients who are undergoing treatment for cancer on clinical trials.

lender.name: Jan-Paul
lender.loan_because: To me, helping people out in helping themselves is a much better option than making them dependent on aid or donations.
lender.occupational_info: business analysis & marketing of specialty ingredients for the food industry.

lender.name: Julie,Monkton On,Canada
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: grow corn, wheat and soybeans to help feed the world

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I truly believe it is one of the best ways to help people help theirselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Swiss bank. I lead a team which is responsable for the prompt execution of our clients orders.

lender.name: A. Vitalis Memorial Fund
lender.loan_because: These loans are made in loving memory of our beloved mother, mother-in-law and grandmother, who passed away in September 2007. Anne will be remembered for the kindness and unconditional love she gave to our family.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I like to put some my personal capital to work to help honest, serious people build their own small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small company in the USA. The purpose of our main research project is to develop new tests that can be used to predict which anti-cancer drug would work the best for a patient.

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: I want to be charitable and I like that Kiva allows me to do so interactively. I like knowing that my money is helping someone specific, who has a purpose and goals they want to reach. I like knowing that my money isn't just being put in a bucket - it's being put into an active cycle. When it comes back to me I can feel like it did something good and then put it back in the cycle to do more good.
lender.occupational_info: I study old buildings and learn about their history and construction. I help architects learn how best to restore buildings, and inform city planners and real estate developers what buildings should be preserved in order to create a better, beautiful, livable, sustainable built environment.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work as a guest teacher--taking over classrooms when the regular teacher is sick or cannot for some reason come to school. I am working toward becoming a bilingual (Spanish) elementary school teacher.

lender.name: Hao Ngo Brown Cow
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an IT professional. I have been doing enterprise IT work for 10 years.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate and want to give others the opportunity to achieve their goals and dreams. Thanks to Kiva, I don't have to be a millionaire to make a difference in the world. I can see the people my loans are going to and share in their excitement of succeeding. How cool to be able to help in such a direct way!!

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I already have more than I need and there are people who don't. Every little bit adds up to a lot

lender.name: Marcelo Rios
lender.loan_because: I would like to help build a new world. A world where everyone has the same opportunity to conquer your dream.

lender.name: Chris and Aliina
lender.loan_because: These Kiva loans were given as gifts for Chris and Aliina's wedding

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: A friend donates on this site and I was impressed by her initiative and philanthropy.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large bank in New York City.

lender.name: Raimundos
lender.loan_because: It improves life of those in need.

lender.name: alexandria
lender.occupation: bugler for military honor guards and Air Force Aux

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I love the stories and I can help so many people again and again with the same investment.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to professional immigrants

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I am a firm believer in the fact that everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Keith
lender.occupational_info: I make computer programs and websites.

lender.name: Alyssa/Doug
lender.loan_because: We believe that our donation will not only help the individual entrepreneur but the entire town in which they reside.
lender.occupational_info: We are both students.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: For my highschool graduation is was given a Kiva gift-certificate. I had never even heard of micro financing organizations like this one. I really like being able to see how money that would normally just sit in my bank account can really bless someone else, and make a huge difference in their life. It has really made me see how much I take money for granted, and how many people all over the world have to work so hard to have a fraction of the comforts that I have with such ease

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupation: Manager / Teacher / Wherever life takes me

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing cuts out the middle man. AND, I love helping people out.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of California Santa Cruz.

lender.name: evangeline
lender.loan_because: i want to start a small clothing business at home.

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: I am trying to do what I can, when I can.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: people helping other people is what life's about.
lender.occupational_info: I help people manage their money.

lender.name: Josie Houtsma
lender.loan_because:
I have been so blessed in life and hope to share some of my blessing with those who have so much less.
John 3:16
lender.occupational_info: I am a parenting coach and counselor and love helping people, especially families that struggle with parenting problems.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturing

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: "where you live should not decide whether you live or whether you die." - Bono

lender.name: r, m, t, and m
lender.loan_because: We want to help.
lender.occupational_info: We are a busy family -- with dad going to work everyday, the kids going to school and playing soccer and swimming, and mom staying home taking care of the household.

lender.name: Daniel and Miranda
lender.loan_because: We travel frequently and we are indebted to the people we have met for their hospitality, care, help and thoughtfulness. We thought we should take the opportunity to give back and helping people achieve financial independence is a good way to do it.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate Agent

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: Sales of office technology.

lender.name: Daryll

lender.name: Dhananjay and Adriana
lender.loan_because: this is such a great idea

lender.loan_because: We would like to help their willing and living.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I want people who are willing to work hard to have access to capital

lender.name: Masaaki S.
lender.loan_because: I would like to connect myself to the rest of world. Also I would like to encourage and support the people who have their own businesses no matter what countries they live in, as I totally understand how important it is to find good, stable funding sources for running businesses.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.loan_because: I feel amazingly lucky even at times embarrassed by how fortunate I am to be born in a country with so many privilages.... This is a small step in sharing the love.
lender.occupational_info: Trave, travel and more travel... Conducting organizing tours down here in the South Pacific

lender.name: Liezle
lender.loan_because: I'm still looking for a job, my father just passed away last February . i want to help my mother because i'm the only one looking for money
lender.occupational_info: i'm still in training in one of the montessori school in my country

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are making an effort to do something positive and just need a little push. We all need help sometimes!

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I do because I can. What I have now is not all because of my endeavor merely. It results from many people's kindness and contribtuion. Although what can I offer is not much, I wish it be meaningful to someone, somewhere.
lender.occupational_info: Business development for credit card business

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to give entrepreneurs in developing countries the means to prove that they can be successful, even amid the many problems and difficulties they face.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am a student at the University of Pittsburgh studying French, Spanish, Swahili, and Political Science. I hope to get a degree in law or international development.

lender.name: Carlie
lender.loan_because: I loan in memory of my friend Laureen who pasted away 16th May 2008 - She was a Fighter! Picture of my friend Laureen
lender.occupational_info: I work only to live - i live for my friends and family.

lender.name: Adeep
lender.loan_because: I believe lending money to fund small businesses is one of the most effective and sustainable ways to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate the introduction of IT systems to organisations.

lender.name: Debby
lender.loan_because: listening to the news of the world's problems can be overwhelming. I feel that I need to do something to help out even if it's just one person at a time.

lender.name: Ben & Belinda
lender.loan_because: It's awesome how small amounts of money can add up and actually make a difference when people band together! Plus we love the idea of being able to help people help themselves. It feels great.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Everyone has to start somewhere
lender.occupational_info: I'm still looking..

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I want to share the good fortune I have been given.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: "There, but for the grace of God, go I"

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life and want to help others fulfill their dreams.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: It is important to me to help others succeed in their goals. I think if we all help each other, we can make the world a better place.

lender.name: Spruce
lender.loan_because: To give is to receive -- it makes my heart happy. Also, I am a small business owner and know how important being supported in growing my business is.
lender.occupational_info: I work with clients doing healing and get to share in people's lives and support them as they grow and change. I also am a visual artist -- paint and make beautiful dolls

lender.name: Matt
lender.occupational_info: giving small businesses a place on the internet

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: it feels good to know I'm helping someone "learn to fish". I remember when someone believed in me enough to lend me capital, and the least I can do is do the same...
lender.occupational_info: I help people rediscover their inner passions. I love helping people clear even their deepest blocks that prevent them from living their passions and purpose.

lender.name: Douglas Arthur
lender.loan_because: I need a loan to expand on my business , currently i can hardly makes ends meet with all the expenses involved, If your organization helps me i will be able to pay this back within 24 months
lender.occupational_info: I am a {iBT} Internet Based Test center administrator .I got involved in this business one year ago, i have been self employed for over five years now, I invested heavily in helping set up two three online tests , that help Students seek admissions in universities abroad. I am single not married but want to get settled soon as the years are advancing. I want to set up a new online test site in my home town Kisumu, there is non currently i want to be the 1st.I want to make this in in the history books to help the disadvantaged bright kids get quality education abroad./this as a way to help bridge the poverty gap.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I've always been lucky enough to have family help me in the past and now I'm finally able to help others who aren't as lucky as I was. Living and traveling in the developing world, I've seen first hand what the difference of a few US dollars can make in the lives of people with great ideas, but who lack the necessary funds.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Latin American agribusiness development bank, analyzing project proposals in Brazil.

lender.name: Phil
lender.occupational_info: I teach web development at a community college.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Aid in the form of business assistance and loans is precious and contributes to sustainable growth and independence.

lender.name: Prashant
lender.loan_because: We are here for giving! We are here forgiven and forgiving. Like the Air, earth, water, fire and sky. We are here to give!
lender.occupational_info: Work in Information Technology ( computer hardware & software).

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students about politics.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to have enough to survive and prosper, but I know that many others do not.
lender.occupational_info: I represent children who are alleged to have been abused or neglected by their parent(s)/guardian(s).

lender.name: M+M
lender.loan_because: POVERTY is the origin of every single problem in the world. When a person is poor, he/she can't afford an education, he/she can't afford health care, and he/she can't take care of the environment. Once people if freed from poverty, they will take care of themselves and their environment, and maybe then give something back to others less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Systems Analyst!

lender.name: Robinie
lender.occupational_info: Sabine is social worker and Robin is Product manager at an IT company.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: what is a small amount from me can do a lot of good elsewhere. These people are trying to lift themselves out of poverty and I think that's worth rewarding with a bit of trust. x
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I am working for the Mauritius Wildlife Foundation doing conservation work to restore ecosystems, translocating seabirds and helping out replanting endangered, endemic and native flora on islands. Its very rewarding. I have plans to start a community eco-project somewhen in the future

lender.name: Monika
lender.loan_because: I like to help.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: The most sustainable development is achieved by people themselves. Micro lending offers motivated women and men the opportunity to improve their lives and that of those around them. I love to be able to assist in this way!
lender.occupational_info: I create ornamental objects and sculptures - .My favorite materials are concrete, tile, glass and metal and any found object that offers itself for the job.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: Our family foundation believes in entrepreneurship and families working together to improve their future.
lender.occupational_info: Our family foundation supports organizations working to offer relief to families in times of stress, disaster, disease, and financial hardship. We teach pastors, high risk youth, and veterans how to use real estate investing to become financially free.

lender.name: JcsKatt
lender.loan_because: Everyone can do something.

lender.name: Ed, Anne & Family
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to help others

lender.occupational_info: I am a project manager working in the field of factory automation and semiconductor equipment. I also teach Design for Manufacturing and Project Management courses to industry professionals.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I defend people accused of a crime throughout the court process.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: sustainability should come from the people not from the government.

lender.name: Mackenzie
lender.loan_because: together we can make a difference !

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have had hard times and now I am blessed and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer software making sure it works properly.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adults and also work on correcting texts.

lender.name: Marcel
lender.loan_because: I want to help people build their own career and to be independent.
lender.occupational_info: I support people in developing their leadership skills through training and coaching.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who have a dream to succeed and help the people in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Southeast Child & Family Services in Winnipeg, MB and I am responsible for helping Foster Parents get funds to help First Nation children in Canada become successful and healthy individuals

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because:
Two reasons: I study Economics, in which microloans have shown to be great ways to aid entrepreneurs in developing countries.
And
I spent a month in Peru last year and loved every minute, and want to give back.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because:
There was a woman named Juanita who helped us with laundry everyday in Lima. Barely 20, she had two kids and lived in a makeshift house with a tin roof just down the street. Just like her, Lima has millions of people who came from the countryside in search of a better life in Lima. Kids juggle at intersections, women sell candy, men shine shoes and wash cars. Each one of them is an informal entrepreneur, trying to make it in the big city and carve out a place for themselves in the world.
I loan because they work harder than anyone I know, and a little investment can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: Make cool stuff online.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I had been reading about Kiva and doing some research when that same day my daughter gave me a gift certificate to Kiva as my mothers day present. I was thrilled!! Some of my family have already talked about doing this for Christmas. I hope this gift helps someone achieve their dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an optometric assistant and volunteer with an organization that provides service dogs for children with autism.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together - hold a hand.

lender.name: poliket
lender.loan_because: My 25 $ wanted to do it and I liked the idea to release them. Now, they are free to do what they wanted to do.

lender.name: Curt
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I attend The Ohio State University in hopes of one day becoming a doctor.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: We're all in this boat together. I help you today, you help someone tomorrow.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Phoebe
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: JUBILEE
lender.loan_because:
It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving. -Mother Teresa
www.fullphasephotography.com

lender.name: Coy & Toni
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a phone company.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves to be healthy and safe and have resources enough to enjoy life with their family and friends.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university, but mostly I work to raise my children to be good citizens of the world.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe in offering the same opportunities given to me to others throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell college textbooks throughout California and make them available to students at greatly discounted prices.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because:
I think that one of the best ways to help people in the long term, is to empower them to help themselves. This is a wonderful opportunity to put one's money to work over and over again as it is loaned to one entrepreneur, repaid and loaned out again to another entrepreneur.
Instead of going out for a meal, one can take the money and loan it to a Developing World entrepreneur who in turn can finance the establishment/expansion of his/her business so he/she can provide shelter, food, clothing and education for his/her dependents and create for herself/himself a happier life and a brighter future.
The loans aren't just helping out the entrepreneur, but also the people/enterprises from who he/she makes purchases to start/expand/operate his/her business.
Look at the economic impact that a business/company has on a community/town/city in your own country and imagine the impact that a few successful entrepreneurial endeavours might have on their communities. It creates a healthy community spirit/environment for these communities to really flourish economically, socially, etc.

lender.name: Maria
lender.occupation: Exotic Animal Rescue & Shelter for abused animals

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: It's a unique way to lend a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor in California.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: a wonderful friend of mine gave me a gift certificate for Kiva for my birthday.
lender.occupational_info: I care for women of all ages, during pregnancy and nonpregnant times, to help them care for and trust their bodies, their babies and their families.

lender.name: nikki b
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help sometimes

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: Because to me it is the right thing to do. You get out of life what you give. And it makes me feel good!
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am the editor of an ezine and a book reviewer. I enjoy paper arts and make soap and bath products.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great way to help others build a better future for them selves.
lender.occupational_info: Build metal products.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: No matter how big or small one's dreams are, having a chance to chase them is priceless.

lender.name: Darrell
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me tremendously, and has put me in charge of His money. It is out of my joy that I can see it be used to bless others.

lender.name: Shivani
lender.loan_because: i think KIVA's got the right idea to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with young offenders in the criminal justice system; helping them with the rehabilitation and diversion process.

lender.name: Fatima
lender.loan_because: Helping others uplift their lives is a source of personal happiness and enrichment.

lender.name: Rakchanok
lender.loan_because: a little help would make their lives better

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I want others to be empowered to use the gifts God has given them to create a financial future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: My company designs and builds restaurants in Vancouver

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people build their lives and their countries

lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people not inside the United States
lender.occupational_info: I play music from all over planet earth

lender.occupational_info: Companion Superior Deluxe Shih Tzu

lender.name: Aquinas
lender.loan_because: It's good to give.
lender.occupational_info: I paint and enjoy bird watching.

lender.occupational_info: The-Women's-Insurance-Net-Work The-Pensions-Net-Work

lender.loan_because: it has become easier to help other people and to get to know where they are and what they need and how are they going to use the money for.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people help themselves, and as a result, their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Enviro Friendly Products, owned by my son and I, supplies a range of water and energy saving products. Our Motto is "Save water, save energy, save money and save the environment."

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: of my communist believes: from the person according his ability; to the person according to his need.
lender.occupational_info: Assist companies with their computer systems.

lender.name: Daniela
lender.loan_because: While there's life, there's hope.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a global bank in a regulatory policy function in New York City.

lender.name: Sveinn
lender.loan_because: What does God require of us? "To do justly, to love mercy, and to walk humbly with your God." (Micah 6:8) We have so much, yet do so little. We are grateful to Kiva for the opportunity to serve.
lender.occupational_info: I have been self employed for 35 years. I own and operate an ice cream parlor on the City Dock of Annapolis, Maryland.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I would like to empower other people to start their own business
lender.occupational_info: I love to take photos and to tell peoples stories for them

lender.name: Mara
lender.loan_because: Anita showed me I could!
lender.occupational_info: I teach students to think about their responsibility in the world around them and their ability to make change.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I learned of Kiva from several sources at about the same time and started immediately. I firmly believe that small businesses are essential for a better world and that for many people starting or growing a small business is much more satisfying than seeking an hourly wage at a large business. I also want to counter predatory lending practices.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in solving unusual technical problems.

lender.name: Andy Z
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed -- And because this is one thing that we can all do to help offset the the unfair distribution of resources in our world... At least a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in women's health.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.occupational_info: I run a non-profit that helps students become excited about learning.

lender.name: Jeffrey & Melanie
lender.loan_because: Some folks just need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: Sell outsourcing solutions for small to medium sized businesses. - 2nd grade teacher.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I loan because, there is so much we take for granted when it comes to the value of the money we earn. What we spend in a few days can often provide weeks of food and housing for others around the world.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: everyone needs help sometimes
lender.occupational_info: I help people make safe and clean drinking water.

lender.name: fabio
lender.loan_because:
Each one has to make his part.
And I trust people.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: Finally!! A non-profit with the right idea. I find that most charities out there are inefficient. They keep giving money and food away year after year and it seems to be a never ending cycle. Kiva's model is the best way to economic progress. Helping someone with their business by "lending" money promotes self-sufficiency and pride, and will also build the local economy.

lender.name: Nisha
lender.loan_because: its a small step that makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I figure out solutions to business problems. It's just like solving puzzles, except with businesses and numbers.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help, after hearing about Kiva I thought it was just such a great idea and felt compelled to do my part
lender.occupational_info: I work with the internet everyday in travel and financial services

lender.name: UHS Economics
lender.loan_because: It is consistent with economic development.
lender.occupational_info: We learn economics.

lender.name: trey
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lizza
lender.loan_because: I can finally afford it! Seriously, how can anyone NOT be on this website?
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying Conservation Biology in NYC, planning on moving to some very remote place to work once I'm done with my MA.

lender.name: lylah
lender.occupation: actor / writer / teacher of theatre {at risk kids}

lender.name: Stephen Siu
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: People have helped me.

lender.name: Meridian UCC
lender.loan_because: Jesus told us to love one another, and that means caring for and supporting each other.
lender.occupational_info: No matter who you are, or where you are on life's journey, you are welcome at Meridian United Church of Christ.

lender.name: Aidan's Mommy
lender.loan_because: ....we all deserve better chances in life.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: to help others there are two things one can do, you can teach new skills or you can help provide the tools for success to one who already has a skill
lender.occupational_info: as a goldsmith I make and repair jewelry. I melt gold and cast it into jewelry items and set precious stones into the item. I also identify precious stones as natural, synthetic, or enhanced treatment.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Sidney
lender.loan_because: I feel I have a responsibility as someone who can help, to help, as much I am capable. I wouldn't be where I am without help from others, and I want to pass that support along to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I make moving grahics and art for television commercials.

lender.name: Lexy
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to do it.

lender.name: classe IV I
lender.loan_because: Our class has been participating in the project "Rome's school for Millennium Goals". In December 2008 we organized a Christmas market in our school. We sold some handmade or used items and we collected some money. We decided to lend the money we had received to support people in developing countries, who want to start a business.
lender.occupational_info: We are a class of the scientific high school "Aristotele" of Rome (Italy). In our class we are 16 students, 6 girls and 10 boys.

lender.name: Blochin
lender.loan_because: I believe in the butterfly effect: a mouse-click in Europe can create jobs and prosperity somewhere else.
lender.occupational_info: The specialist for mobile internet in Italy and Germany - Prepaid SIM-Card, no roaming fees, no contract, pay as you go, recharge your airtime credit. www.saveonroaming.net www.rechargemysim.net

lender.name: daniel
lender.occupational_info: I write for a large newspaper in the U.S. about healthcare.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Lots of people have helped me. I want to return the favor by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the person you go to when you need something or want something done.

lender.name: Antara
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that even a little can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I make movies.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the means to build a secure future for myself, and I want to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a health care software product that allows patients to access care online.

lender.name: Avery
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help at one point in there life, and I would like to be someone who helps them.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: My son Jamal introduced me to this site.

lender.name: Zachariah and Fiona
lender.loan_because: it's so easy to be the change in someones life.

lender.name: Carly
lender.loan_because: Spread the love...
lender.occupational_info: peace, love, positivity, and grooviness

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: Though I may not be financially successful, I have a true appreciation for all that I have. I firmly believe that it is our duty as members of humanity to assist our fellow man in whatever means possible. I am grateful for this opportunity to help others realize their full potential when they would otherwise be unable to.

lender.name: Siobhan
lender.loan_because:
I can.
I think that by loaning through Kiva, I'm helping change someone's life. Someone will be able to plant their crops or start a business or help their children because they've gotten help when they needed it. I'm glad I can be a part of that.

lender.name: Boxy
lender.loan_because: the world needs more hope, trust, social justice, personal connection ang HAPPINESS. P.S. Whoever said "money can't buy happiness" clearly had more than they need!!!!
lender.occupational_info: Making people happy....

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: It's a much better way to spend money, rather than spending it on useless crap.
lender.occupational_info: I print architectural drawings and specs for new construction projects.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: one way for a person without a lot of money to help those with even less money--reciprocal financial partnerships perpetuate a cycle of shared abundance
lender.occupational_info: English professor--concentration and deep interest in reading and writing

lender.name: JEANINE
lender.occupational_info: I CLEAN HOMES N ALSO IM A ORGANIZER

lender.name: annette
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I link people to technology so they can learn, play, and preserve their culture.

lender.name: Julie,Leigh,Lizzie,Lucas
lender.loan_because: This is a rewarding and intensely personal way to help others in need. I hope we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Julie is an engineer and technical writer and Leigh is a computer systems analyst. We have two young children in primary school.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I lend because so many people in the world have a tougher life than I do. I like feeling part of something larger than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky to be able to assist people in buying and selling their homes. Each day I meet the most wonderful people and help their dreams come true.

lender.name: Phaivanh
lender.loan_because: I hope that I will be able to contribute to a positive change in someone's live.
lender.occupational_info: I just graduated from Monterey Institute of International Studies. Previously I worked for CARE International in Lao PDR and was inspired by its work.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: It shouldn't take much to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I create training courses that help people to improve at their jobs. I am also a professional musician.

lender.name: Arisa ( L. V. ) Enomoto
lender.loan_because: I just wanted to help....

lender.name: Sascha the Terrible
lender.loan_because: a cruel, cruel German forced me to do this.

lender.name: Rhonda & Gary
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Karli
lender.loan_because: I love helping people, and this is a really good thing to do with my money.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Political Science and Environmental Studies at Boston College with the hopes of becoming an lawyer in the field of environmental law.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: If a small amount can make such a big change in someone else's life, then it is a thing of beauty!
lender.occupational_info: Registered Nurse

lender.name: Jan and Dave
lender.loan_because: We can, and it's the right thing to do :-)

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Logistical field researcher

lender.name: Mary Lynn
lender.loan_because: My Grandma was an amazing women and a skilled tailor who always helped those in need. I loan money to fellow women tailors in my Grandma’s memory. I feel her amazing spirit lives on through them- she would be proud.
lender.occupational_info: My research focus is to discover new drugs for infectious diseases. I am also passionate about bringing new technology to developing countries
